Description: The S-TIC at NIT Agartala was established on September 18, 2018, on the ground floor of the CSE building (Room No. G-14), covering an area of 1600 sq. ft. It is the first-ever Incubation Centre of ISRO in India, aiming to attract and nurture young academia with innovative ideas and research aptitude, and to develop the Academia-Industry ecosystem.

KeyAchievements.TechnologyTransfer: One product handed over to ISRO, showcased at National Technology Week 2023

NationalTechnologyWeek.InauguratedBy: Prime Minister of India Sri Narendra Damodardas Modi

People.Name: Director of the ISRO CBPO HQ
